definition:
$V$ finite-dimensional vector space

$(v_1,\ldots ,v_n)$ ordered basis for $V$

$(w_1,\ldots ,w_n)$ ordered basis for $V$

$A:V\rightarrow V$

$\forall i\in \{1,\ldots ,n\}: Av_i=w_i$

$\det(A)>0$

fact: there is a unique linear isomorphism taking a given basis to another given basis {#fact-there-is-a-unique-linear-isomorphism-taking-a-given-basis-to-another-given-basis .unnumbered}
======================================================================================

$(v_1,\ldots ,v_n)$ ordered basis for $V$

$(w_1,\ldots ,w_n)$ ordered basis for $V$

$\exists ! A:V\rightarrow V$ linear isomorphism $
: \forall i\in \{1,\ldots ,n\}
: Av_i=w_i$
